title._content: Image taken from page 15 of 'The Sisters; or, the Fatal marriages ... Illustrated with fifty-eight engravings by Kenny Meadows and Alfred Crowquill: a portrait of the author: and twenty-two etchings on steel, by Onwhyn. Second edition, with additions'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Sisters; or, the Fatal marriages ... Illustrated with fifty-eight engravings by Kenny Meadows and Alfred Crowquill: a portrait of the author: and twenty-two etchings on steel, by Onwhyn. Second edition, with additions" Author: COCKTON, Henry. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12651.g.58.", "British Library HMNTS 12624.f.12." Page: 15 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1851 Publisher: W. M. Clark Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000733886 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
